title: Minnesota Nice Expressions
description: Explore the polite, distinctive expressions of Minnesota and the Upper Midwest!

questions.question: In Minnesota, what does 'uff da' express?
options: Surprise, exhaustion, or mild dismay (Scandinavian origin)

questions.question: What does 'Minnesota Nice' generally refer to?
options: The cultural tendency to be polite, reserved, and avoid confrontation

questions.question: In Minnesota, what is a 'hot dish'?
options: A baked casserole (often with tater tots, cream soup, and meat)

questions.question: What does 'oh, for fun!' mean in Minnesota speech?
options: That's so enjoyable! (an expression of delight)

questions.question: In Minnesota, what does 'different' mean in the phrase 'that's... different'?
options: A polite way of saying something is strange or not to one's taste

questions.question: What is 'duck, duck, gray duck' in Minnesota?
options: The Minnesota version of the children's game 'Duck, Duck, Goose'

questions.question: In Minnesota, what does 'oh, ya' typically convey?
What does 'you guys' refer to in Minnesota English?
options: Any group of people regardless of gender

questions.question: In Minnesota, what is 'lutefisk'?
options: A traditional Scandinavian dish of dried whitefish treated with lye

questions.question: What does 'that's not too bad' typically mean in Minnesota understatement?
In Minnesota, what does 'cabin' refer to?
options: Any vacation home or lake house (even if it's large)

questions.question: What does 'bars' refer to when a Minnesotan brings bars to a potluck?
options: Pan-baked desserts cut into rectangular pieces

questions.question: In Minnesota speech, what does 'interesting' often really mean?
options: A polite way of expressing skepticism or disapproval

questions.question: What does 'up north' mean in Minnesota?
options: Going to a cabin or lake area in northern Minnesota for vacation

questions.question: In Minnesota, what is the 'Minnesota Long Goodbye'?
options: An extended departure process involving multiple stages of saying goodbye
